name: @redhat/redhat-font
description: Red Hat - the open source font for Red Hat

scripts.minify: npx csso-cli webfonts/red-hat-font.css --output webfonts/red-hat-font.min.css & npx csso-cli webfonts/font.css --output webfonts/font.min.css
scripts.copy-to-webfonts: cp ./fonts/mono/static/web/RedHatMono*.woff2 ./webfonts/RedHatMono/ && cp ./fonts/proportional/static/web/RedHatDisplay*.woff2 ./webfonts/RedHatDisplay/ && cp ./fonts/proportional/static/web/RedHatText*.woff2 ./webfonts/RedHatText/ && cp ./fonts/proportional/web/{RedHatDisplayVF.woff2,RedHatDisplayVF-Italic.woff2} ./webfonts/RedHatDisplay && cp ./fonts/proportional/web/{RedHatTextVF.woff2,RedHatTextVF-Italic.woff2} ./webfonts/RedHatText && cp ./fonts/proportional/web/*Modified.woff2 ./webfonts/modified && cp ./fonts/mono/web/{*Italic.woff2,*VF.woff2} ./webfonts/RedHatMono
